<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a9da044d39cfcc02b98bfea5875d52741a9f403b340adfff73ac74ab4ecefae3c6">VectorFloat</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#39;01&#39; ==&gt; vector parameter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ParamsTypeInfo &lt;&lt;= <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/xcoff/tracebacktable/#a3cc31e6c739182e31bed5fb2238573cb">XCOFF::TracebackTable::WidthOfParamType</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ParamsTypeInfo |=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/xcoff/tracebacktable/#abb09209bb20d7e4895b08150d60b2f01">XCOFF::TracebackTable::ParmTypeIsVectorBits</a> &gt;&gt; ShiftBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Bits += <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/xcoff/tracebacktable/#a3cc31e6c739182e31bed5fb2238573cb">XCOFF::TracebackTable::WidthOfParamType</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bits &lt; 32 ? ParamsTypeInfo &lt;&lt; (32 - Bits) : ParamsTypeInfo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


</DoxygenPage>
